程序包org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool的分层结构

程序包分层结构:
  • 所有程序包

类分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.ClassLoaderUtil
    • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.ConnectionPool
    • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.ConnectionPool.ConnectionFuture (implements java.util.concurrent.Future<V>, java.lang.Runnable)
    • java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch
      • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.FairBlockingQueue.ExchangeCountDownLatch<T>
      • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.MultiLockFairBlockingQueue.ExchangeCountDownLatch<T>
    • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.DataSourceFactory (implements javax.naming.spi.ObjectFactory)
    • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.DataSourceProxy (implements org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.PoolConfiguration)
      • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.DataSource (implements javax.sql.ConnectionPoolDataSource, org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.jmx.ConnectionPoolMBean, javax.sql.DataSource, javax.management.MBeanRegistration)
        • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.XADataSource (implements javax.sql.XADataSource)
    • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.FairBlockingQueue<E> (implements java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<E>)
    • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.FairBlockingQueue.FairIterator (implements java.util.Iterator<E>)
    • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.FairBlockingQueue.ItemFuture<T> (implements java.util.concurrent.Future<V>)
    • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.JdbcInterceptor (implements java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler)
      • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.interceptor.AbstractCreateStatementInterceptor
        • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.StatementFacade
      • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.DisposableConnectionFacade
      • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.ProxyConnection
      • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.TrapException
    • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.MultiLockFairBlockingQueue<E> (implements java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<E>)
    • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.MultiLockFairBlockingQueue.FairIterator (implements java.util.Iterator<E>)
    • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.MultiLockFairBlockingQueue.ItemFuture<T> (implements java.util.concurrent.Future<V>)
    • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.PooledConnection (implements org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.PooledConnectionMBean)
    • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.PoolProperties (implements java.lang.Cloneable, org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.PoolConfiguration, java.io.Serializable)
    • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.PoolProperties.InterceptorDefinition (implements java.io.Serializable)
    • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.PoolProperties.InterceptorProperty (implements java.io.Serializable)
    • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.PoolUtilities
    • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.StatementFacade.StatementProxy (implements java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler)
    • java.lang.Throwable (implements java.io.Serializable)
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.sql.SQLException (implements java.lang.Iterable<T>)
          • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.PoolExhaustedException
    • java.util.TimerTask (implements java.lang.Runnable)
      • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.ConnectionPool.PoolCleaner

接口分层结构
